Description.Name: Hephaestus Scout Tank
Description.Details: This non-Omni 3083 version of the Hephaestus Scout Tank is equipped with a pair of ER Medium Lasers, and it dispenses with all electronics in favor of four Anti-personnel Gauss Rifles. The standard fusion engine provides a maximum ground speed of nearly 150 km/h while five and a half tons of ferro-fibrous armor protects the tank while the hoverskirts have been reinforced with an Armored Motive System. The most interesting feature, however, is the set of eight Jump Jets mounted in the body, which allows this hovertank to cover 240 meters in a single bound. Not since the Kanga has this system been deployed on a combat unit. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 9/14 Hex: 270/420 Meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 120 20 Left 120 20 Right 120 20 Rear 95 20 Turret 110 20 Total 565 100 Quirk: Distracting

YangsThoughts: What the hell is this thing boss!? It has a similar look and loadout to the standard Hephaestus Scout Tank but its not an OmniVehicle and its got eight Jump Jets mounted on it for clearing not so small obstacles. All that extra weight had to come from somewhere though so this thing is five tons heavier and no longer carries an infantry bay.
